SEARCH
Module org.postgresql.pljava
Package org.postgresql.pljava

Interface PLJavaBasedLanguage.TriggerFunction

Enclosing interface:
PLJavaBasedLanguage
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static interface PLJavaBasedLanguage.TriggerFunction
The result of a specialize call on a TriggerTemplate.

An instance can incorporate whatever can be precomputed based on the specific Trigger that was passed to specialize. Its apply method will then be invoked to act on the TriggerData and produce the results each time that trigger fires.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    TupleTableSlot
    apply(RegProcedure.Call.Context.TriggerData triggerData)
    Actually executes the prepared and specialized TriggerFunction, with the triggering data available in triggerData.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      TupleTableSlot apply(RegProcedure.Call.Context.TriggerData triggerData) throws SQLException
      Actually executes the prepared and specialized TriggerFunction, with the triggering data available in triggerData.

      The return value, ignored for an AFTER trigger, and restricted to null for any BEFORE STATEMENT trigger, can influence the triggering operation for other types of triggers. To permit the operation with no changes by the trigger, return exactly triggerTuple (for a trigger on INSERT or DELETE), or exactly newTuple (for a trigger on UPDATE). To suppress the triggering operation, return null.

      Returns:
      a TupleTableSlot, or null
      Throws:
      SQLException
